ComicInfo.Summary: Where Not To Buy Boom! Studios Comics: A Play In One Act: The story of Ed's boring existence and about how he was tagged with the curse of being the living dead. The only way to be cured of the curse is to tag someone else. Ed has passed the curse on by tagging someone with it but he can't seem to help being obsessed with it. He decides to end the curse by backtracking through people who have been tagged until he can find who has the curse right now so that he can keep it from being passed on. He sells everything he owns and starts out on the road to find the person carrying the curse right now.
